about_the_game:
A great evil lurks in the dark and enchanted depths of this castle...

A great villain must have an evil lair, and what better location than an evil castle? Evil Castle Tiles will help you develop a perfect backdrop for that final boss encounter.

With Evil Castle Tiles, you can create a dark magic castle, a derelict crypt or a dungeon of torture. Unique details and decorative elements will bring each map to a new level, while the dark and rich colors will enhance the atmosphere of unease and fear.

Features:
  • A smooth, painterly style
  • Auto-tiles for walls, water and floors.
  • Decorative elements such as statues, magical paraphernalia, and caskets.
  • Castle staples, including heavy gates, torches, trap elements and more.
